name: Magic Drums: AI Rhythm Games
description:
Do you love music rhythm games as we do? We created a new ability to make fantastic BEATS in your own real magic studio right here, right now. What are you waiting for?! You don’t need any special equipment, just your hands, your curious imagination, and pencils or chopsticks to get started.

[GAMES RULES]
How does it work? Magic of course! We have developed a special way to turn the sounds you are making into magic beats in real-time!

Each track has its own sounds. Now you will create real music. Excited?
1) Each colorful circle is matched to a definite calibrated surface.
2) When the circle reaches a bright activation area, don't miss it - BEAT the surfaces.
3) Open your mind and be ready for surprises!

It’s easy to start even if you are not a genius at rhythmic games!

We built the app so you can experience music not just as a listener, but as an artist and a creator too! Believe in yourself and let the world hear YOUR BEAT.

[APP FEATURES]
◆ Huge music library in various genres: Dance, Club, Dubstep, House, Techno, Drum & Bass, R&B, Pop, Hip-hop, Rock, Alternative, and many others;

◆ Amazing DJ tracks to experience the real beat power;

◆ Regular content updates;

◆ 3 levels of difficulty: Easy, Medium, Hard to follow the rhythm of addictive challenges;

◆ Each song has its own original drums and beats sample;

◆ Personal performance dashboard with daily progress, song scores, and BPM to improve your rhythm skills with time and consistent practice;

◆ Awards for an outstanding performance: Energetic, Perfect, Rhythmic Combo;

◆ Impress your friends and share your achievements on social media!

[Ideas? Questions?]
Just fill in the app feedback form or send us an email at support@7thbeat.space and we’ll get back to you right away.

[Magic Drums subscription]
We offer you 3 different subscriptions: full player level weekly at $10.99, beatstars level monthly at $29.99 US (32% OFF), pro drummer level annually at $79.99 US (85% OFF).

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase.
